docs.summary: Anchors are invisible position markers which you can place anywhere on your site. They are a useful way to direct users to important sections.

srcDocs.summary: Anchors are invisible position markers which you can place anywhere on your site. They are a useful way to direct users to important sections.

docs.summary: Gets the name of an anchor.
description: An anchor's `name` is used as a label for the anchor. The value of the `name`
An anchor's `name` is set in the Editor using the Anchor Settings panel.

examples.title: Get the name of an anchor
